member.name: ICONMETRICSA
member.summary: Contains the scalable metrics associated with icons. This structure is used with the function when the SPI_GETICONMETRICS or SPI_SETICONMETRICS action is specified.

member.name: ICONMETRICSA.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes.

member.name: ICONMETRICSA.iHorzSpacing
member.summary: The horizontal space, in pixels, for each arranged icon.

member.name: ICONMETRICSA.iVertSpacing
member.summary: The vertical space, in pixels, for each arranged icon.

member.name: ICONMETRICSA.iTitleWrap
member.summary: If this member is nonzero, icon titles wrap to a new line. If this member is zero, titles do not wrap.

member.name: ICONMETRICSA.lfFont
member.summary: The font to use for icon titles.
